info.title: Teplomer API
info.description: REST API for thermometer / weather station, implemented in C++ using Drogon.

200.description: Number of deleted rows as plain text

get.description: Returns a single Fireport device credential record by its UUID. Access is ownership-based.

200.description: Number of deleted rows as plain text

delete.description: Deletes a Fireport device credential record by UUID. Requires ownership.

get.description: Admin-only: returns all Fireport device credential records.
Returns Fireport device credentials that the authenticated user can access (ownership-based).

post.description: Creates new Fireport device credentials (device_id + password) and assigns ownership to the authenticated user.

put.description: Updates Fireport device credentials (id + device_id + password). Requires ownership of the Fireport record.

post.description: Admin-only: triggers a notification/refresh action for a specific Fireport device by UUID.
Triggers a notification/refresh action for a specific Fireport device (ownership-based).
Triggers a notification/refresh action for Fireport devices accessible to the authenticated user. Payload depends on backend implementation.
Admin-only: triggers a notification/refresh action for all Fireport devices.
